item.title: Get Id of All items in Google Drive Folder
item.description: Problem Suppose you want to Extract Id of all the items resides in a Folder of Goolge Drive. There are many ways to Do this like Manually Copying from each file or Programtically . I Will Guide you How to Do this using program in C# Requirement Shared Google Drive Folder id /URL https://drive.google.com/drive/u/4/folders/1759s8Jule46RCPypiQ5y3wLh5aCPlrK6 IDE Like VS Code Or Visual Studio Preffered. Leatest .NET SDK Installed. You Can Get it From Here Steps 1 Open IDE Or Code Editor.
